00400 /* Floating Point Error */
00401 #if defined(MACHINE_EPS)
00402 #     define VFLOOR(value) \
00403               ((floor(value) != floor(value + MACHINE_EPS)) ? \
00404               floor(value + MACHINE_EPS) : floor(value))
00405 #else
00406
